products.title: Super Oasis Concentrated Serum
products.subTitle: Quench skin with 100-hour hydration.
products.content: Relieve the feel of dry, tight skin and seal in replenishing moisture for 100 hours.1 Formulated with Hydrous Flow Technology, a combination of glycerin, aquaporin booster, and hyaluronic acid flood moisture reservoirs. A nutrient-rich blend of shea butter, baobab, and marula oil support the hydrolipid barrier. Skin looks soft, supple

products.title: Ultra Plush Rich Cream
products.subTitle: Revive skin with 100-hour hydration.
products.content: Relieve the feel of dry, tight skin and seal in replenishing moisture for 100 hours.1 Formulated with Hydrous Flow Technology, a combination of glycerin, aquaporin booster, and hyaluronic acid flood moisture reservoirs. A nutrient-rich blend of shea butter, baobab, and marula oil support the hydrolipid barrier. Skin looks soft, supple

products.title: Korean Skincare Regimen: Oily / Acne-Prone Skin
products.subTitle: For those struggling with shine/prone to breakouts
products.content: Oily skin: You are likely struggling with combatting shine/prone to breakouts, blackheads and blemishes/likely to have enlarged pores/skin tends to be thicker/typical T-zone issues. If you have oily skin, your sebaceous glands tend to over-produce oils on the skin's barrier. There's a difference between oily/dry vs. hydrated/dehydrated. You can have oily-dehydrated skin (your skin has excess sebum, but is dehydrated underneath).

products.title: Glass Skin Refining Serum
products.subTitle: Achieve your healthiest, smoothest, clearest and most luminous skin yet
products.content: Glassy, smooth, luminous, translucent-looking skin is achieved when skin is well hydrated and without inflammation and free radical damage. A revolutionary cocktail of peach extract, niacinamide, East Asian mountain yam, madecassoside, peptides, and hyaluronic acid help to visibly hydrate, calm, brighten and firm skin. Crystal-clear

products.title: Rescue Party Duo
products.subTitle: Rapidly calm, comfort and nourish reactive skin.
products.content: Need skin barrier relief? This nourishing duo visibly soothes irritated and flaky skin with 0.8% colloidal oatmeal and Korean botanicals, while 5 ceramides and good fats replenish the skin barrier. Our proprietary Calcium Complex supports with calcium, vital for healthy barrier function. Stay calm–your Rescue Party is here.

products.title: Glass Skin Discovery Kit
products.subTitle: Discover skin that glows like glass.
products.content: Looking for skin that's so healthy that pores look smooth and skin looks luminous and clarified? You’re in the right place. Our Glass Skin Discovery Kit features our iconic four-step Glass Skin routine in a convenient trial size. Whether you’re new to Peach & Lily or looking to take your favorite routine on the go, there’s no easier way to achieve Glass Skin quickly.

products.title: Botanical Nutrition Power Cream
products.subTitle: Help in seal in skin moisture
products.content: A cream formulated with all-natural and healthy botanicals that help your skin seal in moisture. Keeps skin dewy and hydrated even on the driest days.

products.title: Retinal For All Renewing Serum
products.subTitle: 20X more powerful. Zero irritation. Featuring patent-pending R-IQTM technology.
products.content: Winner of Cosmopolitan’s 2023 Holy Grail Beauty Awards, Retinal For All Renewing Serum is the new retinal gold standard. Reduce fine lines up to 50% in just 4 weeks1,2  and improve skin texture by 62%1—with 0% irritation3 and no prescription. You’ve never seen a retinoid do this before.

products.title: Peptide Pro Firming Moisturizer
products.subTitle: A next-gen proven wrinkle cream for all ages
products.content: Firming ingredients can deliver more visible results when skin is also hydrated and the skin barrier is healthy. We crafted a next-generation wrinkle cream that includes a hydrating moisturizer and skin barrier repair cream in the formula – to supercharge your results. We challenged the notion of thicker, traditional wrinkle creams for more mature skin only. Collagen production starts to decline in your twenties, so we firmly (pun intended!) wanted this wrinkle cream to be for all ages. Lightweight enough for all ages and all skin types, potent enough for more intensive and deeply etched wrinkles and loss of firmness.

products.title: Ginger Melt Oil Cleanser
products.subTitle: A modern oil cleanser that melts and removes all with zero residue, zero breakouts.
products.content: Melt and remove all makeup, SPF, excess oil and impurities – within seconds. Oil cleansing can be accompanied by leftover-mascara, breakouts or a waxy residue. Ginger Melt Oil Cleanser is your modern oil cleanser crafted with zero compromises. Here's how it works: First, even the toughest makeup and SPF melt off with ease. Confidently use your white towels again. No makeup stains here. Second, a few splashes of water is enough with no need to tug at skin with tissue or cloths. Discover spotless skin with zero residue – no oil, waxiness, or greasiness. Ginger Melt is non-drying, non-clogging, and all skin types are welcome. Reveal skin that's refreshed and balanced thanks to antioxidant-rich ginger, clarifying pineapple and papaya, and soothing sunflower seed and grapeseed oils.

products.title: Snail Rescue All-in-One Oil Free Moisturizer
products.subTitle: Quench thirsty skin and achieve a clear, shine-free glow
products.content: This weightless moisturizer helps quench thirsty skin, zap zits, and minimize shine thanks to 95% snail mucin and cica. This refreshing, gel-texture moisturizer strikes the perfect balance. It deeply hydrates, doesn't clog pores, and provides enough lasting moisturization so that skin stays supple all day. Snail mucin hydrates, keeps skin smooth-sailing and delivers an even glow. Meanwhile, cica calms signs of redness, birch juice helps skin look brighter and more even-toned, and strawberry extract helps achieve bouncy, polished skin. And of course, no snails are harmed!

products.title: Botanical Pore Toner
products.subTitle: Sebum-controlling formula that doesn't dry out skin
products.content: A serum packed with natural ingredients and formulated to soothe the skin and minimize the appearance of pores. Botanical herbs, Alaskan glacier water and sea plants hydrate while helping to control oil production. Ideal for normal to oily skin.

products.title: Oil Control Collection
products.sutTitle: Cut the shine. Ditch the oil. Take control.
products.content: Say hello to shine-free results that won’t strip skin dry. Featuring breakthrough shine-blocking technology, the Peach Slices Oil Control Collection combines active ingredients Niacinamide, Zinc PCA and an anti-sebum complex powered by time-tested Korean herbal roots to reduce excess oil, minimize the appearance of pores, and mattify skin while Pine Bark and Green Tea work to soothe skin and reduce signs of inflammation.

products.title: Botanical Nutrition Power Serum
products.subTitle: Botanical Nutrition Power Serum
products.content: This serum draws on botanical herbs that have been used for thousands of years in Asian history to hydrate and help with signs of aging skin. This best-selling serum helps impart moisture and radiance to dry, dull skin. Ideal for dry skin.

products.title: Botanical Nutrition Toner
products.subTitle: An all-natural, no-frills toner
products.content: An all-natural, no-frills toner that balances the skin's pH level thanks to botanicals and timeless herbs. Helps prep skin with hydration for following serums and lotions and has herbal botanicals with anti-bacterial properties to combat any trouble-areas on your skin. Appropriate for all skin types. Ideal for combination.

products.title: Natural Coconut Cleansing Oil
products.subTitle: An all-natural, no-frills toner
products.content: An all-natural, no-frills toner that balances the skin's pH level thanks to botanicals and timeless herbs. Helps prep skin with hydration for following serums and lotions and has herbal botanicals with anti-bacterial properties to combat any trouble-areas on your skin. Appropriate for all skin types.
